title: AI-Enhanced Mathematics Education Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Mathematical Concepts and Digital Device Proficiency
context.additional_context: Mathematics education design course for pre-professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields, focusing on enhancing instructional design capabilities using generative AI tools like ChatGPT as supplementary resources.

learning_goals: Learners can perform the math education activity design process using AI tools with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze sociocultural elements of AI-teacher collaboration systems by applying the activity theory framework.
Learners can integrate educational objectives and technological constraints with over 90% alignment when developing math problems using generative AI.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
